case.state: Is that... me?! Did Universal Control cause this?!
Okino seemed kinda upset that I chose to come here today. I wonder why.
It's Christmas, isn't it? Okino got me a collar. I wonder if he's thinking of getting a dog soon...
Isn't it Halloween? Suppose there isn't much scarier than taking off your clothes in front of strangers.
This must be the place Okino told me about. He was insistent that I give it a shot.
(Hold on... Okino didn't say there would be such a cute girl here...)
(That girl in the shrine maiden outfit... I can't stop looking at her...)
(Does he only make spaghetti, or is yakisoba pan on the table...?)
An autonomous drone, here? Life sure is full of surprises.
Bobobobo... Bobobobobo... Bobo... Bo?
Deimos?! Here?! O-Oh, no, it's just a guy...
Tell this "Captain of America" that I just want to talk.
Just because Okino said I'm a funny guy doesn't mean I'm a joke.
Always happy to play a game with my brothers and sisters.
Wait, is that why I'm here?! I'm used to fighting kaiju, but ghost busting is something else entirely!
Chihiro-san, right? It's an honor to meet you, truly. I'm Takatoshi Hijiyama.
Which is to say, we're all sons and daughters of the same great nation.
(If I had to guess... ~Player~~player.ifMale(|-san)~ is probably a cat person. Well... Not like that matters...)
Oh... There's no women here? I'll take that as a sign that this will be a friendly game with nothing strange going on.
I'm not sure if I understand how this'll help me "loosen up", but if it's a battle, then I'm not one to back down.
~Cards~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, right?
These American games are so confusing... ~cards~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~.
I'll take... ~cards~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~.
I'll take ~cards~... No, wait... Actually, yes.
This is my last shot at victory... Give me ~cards~.
If ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ won't save me, nothing will.
Even in the face of defeat, I won't back down. Dealer! ~cards~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~!
Hmph. Maybe I'm better at this than I thought I'd be.
Winning the battle doesn't win the war... but it doesn't hurt, either.
I'm off to a good start, but I can't get complacent.
I'm not throwing away my shot!
Hey, is that a hundred-yen coin on the ground? That's a lucky find.
A true son of Japan never surrenders. I'll see this through to the end.
No more acting like an amateur.
I need to hold out, even if it's just for a little bit longer.
It's time for a counterattack.
I have to win this. For my pride... and my dignity.
I... actually got a good hand for once? Maybe my luck is turning around...
Alright! How do you like me now, Okino?
(Could really go for some yakisoba pan right now... But I guess that's no different from normal.)
Keitaro is always going on about his "hemborger". Doesn't he know that yakisoba pan is the food of the Gods?!
Is this hand good or bad? I can't tell.
The Sentinel I pilot is No. 12, a 1st Generation unit. It's good at both taking and dealing damage in melee range.
Could be better, could be worse. That's true of a lot of things.
Being at a slight disadvantage doesn't mean you can't pull out a victory.
Worst comes to worst, I can always retreat to Sentinel No. 12... But I won't resort to that kind of cowardice.
Why is there no card with a 1 on it? Did the Americans just forget to add it?
After this, would anybody like to go out for yakisoba pan? I'd say it's my treat, but...
I can summon Sentinel No. 12 by activating a switch on my left forearm. I should probably avoid doing that here.
I can't lose now. Otherwise I might have to do... that...
There must be a way out of this...
I'm used to being caught in a bind, but it doesn't seem like I can punch my way out of this one.
(Sentinel cockpit... Cockpit... Hmm...)
(I know Okino gave me advice before the game. Now if only I could remember what it was...)
I don't know much about this game, but I know this doesn't look good.
We managed to push back the Deimos... but I can't shake this feeling of uneasiness.
Would anybody like to trade hands? This one isn't doing me any favors.
1st-Generation Sentinels are made to take a beating. Even still, whenever I take a hit, I can't help but feel like I'm acting like an amateur.
I guess life comes at you fast.
(There's a hundred-yen coin on the floor... But if I picked it up in front of all these people, I would look pathetic...)
Is there any way I can get a new hand? Hey, don't look at me like that's a stupid question.
Okino must've known this would happen. I bet he's laughing his ass off right now...
We're always naked inside of the Sentinels, but we usually don't see each other's crotches.
No, this isn't good... I must have gotten careless.
Better than a Drum Mine exploding in my face, at least.
(These two are flirting incessantly... Some women in this era have no eye for men!)
You're from another world? Does that mean you're an alien? I mean, you don't look like an alien, but...
Wait... Wives? Plural?! That's not even legal in Japan!
(What would Amiguchi say? Something like... "Gotta put on a show for Chihiro-san.")
Yakisoba pan.
So Chihiro-san made an AI with its own personality? At this point, she may even be smarter than Okino...
(I don't believe it... Chihiro-san was actually a guy? So then... why do I still feel like this?)
Just when I thought I had seen everything, along comes a guy who can control his nose hair...
If it's a fight you want, Polly-san... Very well! I'll show you not to mess with the pride of the Empire!
Huh? Since when did my hair have a mind of its own...?
I left home when I was a teenager, but it was of my own volition. I wanted to serve in the military, to protect my homeland from harm.
Hmm... Does this mean I should call you Miko-sama...?
Bobobo, you said my hair... spoke to you, right? What did it say? (Probably nothing good...)
In hindsight, wearing a jacket to the beach wasn't the smartest move...
Hold on, do they sell food here? Your finest yakisoba pan, please!
Why are we doing this in a classroom, anyway? This kind of... hanky-panky has no place in a school environment!
You know, I was once so desperate that I took a bath in a river. That cold took me out of commission for a while.
Laws are important, but they can only get you so far. Sometimes, you have no choice but to take up arms.
Tsukasa Okino... He's a genius, and he knows it. Enigmatic, but he always has good intentions. And... well, I-I guess he is kind of cute...
Okino said the strangest thing the other day... Do any of you know what "monk-uhh-ess" means?
This is... the new 20s, right? So this must be Sector 3. I'm from Sector 5, the 1940s.
If there were another version of you, but they lived a completely different life... Are they still you?
Have any of you ever fallen in love with somebody, only to find out they weren't who you thought they were?
(Having to do this in front of such a cute girl... Ugh, it's humiliating.)
Wait, you're Prince Shoutoku, Miko-san?! The one who brought Buddhism to our glorious nation?!
Unbelievable... I'm acting like an amateur!
H-Huh?! No, this can't be happening! Because...
I know that I can't keep winning forever. I'm just glad to have done this well so far.
A couple of losses doesn't mean total defeat. I can still recover from this.
I can't let myself get thrown off now... I can still do this if I play my cards right.
I got careless. I can't make that mistake again.
I have to get naked in front of these people... But I can still avoid the final penalty...
If you're seeing this, then something's gone wrong. Contact Universal Control using the feedback button.
My first loss, huh... Hopefully there aren't any more to come.
Dammit... I've gotten by with small things until now, but it seems that's no longer an option.
It's just a bout of bad luck. I can still bounce back from this.
If you're seeing this, then something's gone wrong. Contact Universal Control using the feedback button.
So making me take off my pants wasn't enough, huh? I guess I don't have a choice but to accept the loss...
I... lost? No, no... I can still do this. There's always a way out. There has to be.
Damn, already? It's only my first loss, but even still...
Did Okino send me here thinking I would lose? Honestly, I wouldn't put it past him.
If you're seeing this, then something's gone wrong. Contact Universal Control using the feedback button.
Ugh... It's a good thing I'm used to fighting at a disadvantage.
This isn't how a Japanese soldier should be acting. I should be better than this, damn it...
I want to believe that I can still do this... That victory is just over the horizon, but...
Apologies, Chihiro-san. I know this situation is awkward, to say the least.
My yakisoba pan... I didn't even get to eat a single bite!
Truth is, I stole this jacket off some punk that started a fight with me. Now I have a reputation as a "jacket snatcher".
Taking off my pants in front of a bunch of strangers... Ugh, this is humiliating...
I knew the rules coming in, but this still feels obscene... I'll just start with something small.
Honestly, my socks were getting a little dirty anyway. I don't exactly have too many pairs.
It's too late for a tactical retreat. I don't have any other option...
This is it, then... My underwear. The pride of Japan, reducing himself to this indecency...
(C'mon, Takatoshi... You want to impress her, right? Then quit acting like an amateur!)
Alright, that's it! I have no mercy for those who waste food... especially yakisoba pan!
It's not like I enjoy stealing clothes from random street toughs, but desperate times call for desperate measures.
That doesn't mean I'm happy about this, though... I need to get a grip, and fast.
I've lost this battle, but the war is far from over. Let's get back to it.
The best I can do is avoid losing in the future. Otherwise... I don't even want to think about what will happen.
I used to have more muscle than this. Six months of homelessness will do that to you.
Don't look, alright? At least when I'm in the Sentinel cockpit, the other pilots don't get to see me down there.
Wait, you're "stripping" a rocket launcher? Are you sure that's a good idea? At least unload it first--
Looks like this is your first loss, Bobobo. Now, I wonder if you'll take off...
"Twisted Fate"... I've never met a man like you before. What, are you some kind of cowboy?
You're a professional gambler, right? Most forms of gambling are illegal in Japan... but I wouldn't mind you accompanying me to the horse races sometime.
I take it you've never served in any sort of military, Colt. They usually teach you not to wave around your guns like that.
Aster... You're a lot like me, right? I can tell. Just a couple of young men fighting to protect the things they love.
Don't fret now, ~name~. You can always turn around a bad situation.
Sorry about that, ~name~, but I'm glad I survived another round.
Man-to-man, there's no shame in enduring a loss... though there might be in what comes afterward.
You and I are in this together, ~name~. Like brothers-in-arms.
(~Name~ is going to take off his clothes... I-I'm not getting excited, right? Is it showing?)
Just power through the embarrassment and rip it off. That's the way to do it.
(Okino messed with my head, and now the idea of seeing another man strip is turning me on...)
I'm not getting excited because of you, ~name~. Really. Just carry on like normal.
(~Name~ is going to take off his clothes... Ugh, I can't think straight...)
You've claimed victory over me today, ~name~. That, alone, is something to be proud of.
At the very least, ~name~, you came out on top of me. W-Wait...
So I can sit back and enjoy the show now? Not that I'm enjoying this, of course.
Chihiro-san, if you don't mind me saying this... I'll remember this day forever.
Oh, Chihiro-san, you came back! I'm glad. I almost started to miss you.
The culture where you're from is very different from what I'm used to, Polly-san. Talking about drugs like that would get you arrested on the spot in Japan...
I'm... going to see a ghost's boobs? I'm not sure whether to be excited or terrified...
Mia-san, I have to admit that I'm confused about your heritage. Why would a place called "Kurain Village" be in America?
I'm not afraid of any kaiju or ghost.
Is this what you call a "ghost in the machine"?
I'll whittle away your defenses, one by one!
I'm not going to let the past haunt me.
I'm not much of a prankster, but pulling one over on you is satisfying.
And I thought I was acting like an amateur. You can do better, Polly-san.
Where'd all that trash talk get you in the end, huh?!
At this rate, Polly-san, you're going to head to prom empty-handed!
I thought chemists were supposed to be smart.
(A female student? What's she doing out so late? More importantly, what's she doing here?)
Apologies, ~name~-san. I don't feel great about triumphing over a woman.
So men and women can just play with each other freely? That's a little dangerous, isn't it?
I want to win this game, but I'll admit that I'm not happy about the means.
(~Name~-san is going to strip... Don't look, Takatoshi, be a gentleman...)
I know you probably wanted to win, but I can't exactly afford to lose right now.
I hope you're not upset with me, ~name~-san. I'm just not one to throw a fight.
Out of respect, ~name~-san, I'll avert my gaze. At least, I'll try to.
(~Name~-san hasn't even stripped yet, but I'm already getting harder...)
Please don't pay me any mind, ~name~-san. This is embarrassing enough as it is.
You're... still in the game, ~name~-san? How did I get eliminated so quickly?
I hope I'm not making you uncomfortable, ~name~-san. Putting my clothes back on isn't an option at the moment.
Ah... ~name~-san is going to strip. (Stay down, don't get excited...)
H-Huh? This can happen?
Whoa! Everybody get down!
My friend Keitaro wears a hat to cover a scar on his forehead. Do you have similar reasoning?
Taking off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~? Can't blame you. I would do the same.
I respect stripping something small. You want to mitigate your losses as much as possible.
You want to win too, right, ~name~? In that case, I can't complain.
Taking off that little when I'm already this bare... That's what I get for acting like an amateur.
At this rate, it's starting to feel like you'll never be as exposed as me.
(It's gonna take a miracle for me to pull ahead of ~name~...)
Just taking off your ~clothing~, huh? That's a little frustrating.
You're taking off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, and I'm sitting over here doing this... How did I screw up so badly?
If that's all you're taking off, ~name~, then you might still be able to avoid this.
You didn't just bring that to give yourself an advantage, did you? There's no honor in that.
I don't blame you for taking off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, ~name~, but you also can't blame me for being frustrated.
Just ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, huh? That's disappointing... for everybody else, I mean.
Whew... What the hell are you doing?! A blunder like that would get you discharged from the army in an instant!
...Guess not.
No use in getting mad about it. Let's get back to the game.
Feeling a little more comfortable, ~name~? Well, don't get too complacent.
You've only lost something small, ~name~. Don't count yourself out yet.
Getting mad at ~name~ won't give me any of my clothes back. Let's just get back to it.
I'm not mad at you, ~name~. I'm just mad at myself.
(Still, if ~name~ is losing, maybe I have a chance after all...)
Nngh... Apologies, ~name~, that wasn't because of you.
(I'm not frustrated because I wanted to see him take off more, right? No, that can't be it.)
Be careful where you put that, ~name~. I mean, I'm not aiming for it, of course, but, uh... (Ugh, shouldn't have said anything.)
Though, I've already lost, so I guess it doesn't matter what you take off now.
Well... I've already lost, so I don't know why I'm upset that you're not taking off more...
But you want to win, right? I've lost my chance, but maybe you still have one.
Just your ~clothing~, huh? I respect that.
I understand if you're uncomfortable, ~name~-san, but rest assured that I won't do anything strange.
Even seeing women taking off something small isn't a sight I'm used to, in all honesty.
(I'm not so sensitive that seeing a girl take off her ~clothing~ would excite me, right?)
I can hold it for you if you'd like, ~name~-san. I won't do anything weird with ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~, I promise.
(Keep calm, Takatoshi, it's just her ~clothing~.)
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ cute, ~name~-san. But I wasn't staring at ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~, or anything.
I'm not some kind of pervert who would get turned on just from seeing a girl take off her ~clothing~... I think.
I don't care if you're taking it slow, ~name~-san. I've got all the time in the world.
Go at your own pace. It's not like I have a chance of winning at this point.
I took off a few small things, too. What I wouldn't give to have had a few more of those...
That's that, then. Onto the next round, ~name~-san?
In here, a single defeat doesn't mean it's the end. Keep your chin up, ~name~-san.
I'd offer to protect you, ~name~-san, but I don't want to lose... This is a problem...
Honestly, ~name~-san, I almost think you look cuter without your ~clothing~.
(Getting turned on by seeing a girl without her ~clothing~ is like being so desperate for food that you would dig through garbage.)
Keep calm. You still have a chance... Probably more than me, honestly.
(I want to see ~name~-san in even less... That's only natural, right?)
I respect your decision, ~name~-san, even if I am a little disappointed.
At least all the attention is on ~name~-san. That makes this a little less embarrassing...
But you can't take off small things forever. Trust me, I learned the hard way.
(I don't need to get upset. Good things will come in due time.)
It's not like I want you to lose, ~name~-san, but if there can only be one winner...
Just your ~clothing~. Can't be too bad, right?
Something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ would just be a liability on the battlefield.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~... ~clothing.ifPlural(Do they|Does it)~ all look like that in your era, ~name~?
Not incredibly exciting, but a little bit of quiet is fine too.
I'll warn you, ~name~... It's oddly breezy right now.
So we're getting to the good stuff now... Not that a man stripping is good, or, uh...
One step closer... (For both of us...)
You sure you don't want to take off a little more, ~name~? For my sake.
I'm not interested in ~name~ taking off his ~clothing~... He can keep it on, for all I care...
Why'd there have to be other men here? It's making my head feel weird.
You'll get here... eventually.
Taking off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, huh? It is getting kinda warm in here.
Already took off my jacket. Least you can do is something similar.
It's too early to concede defeat, but too late to run away. Give it your best shot, ~name~.
It's only going to get worse from here, ~name~. Prepare yourself while you can.
Look on the bright side. A little easier to move around now, right?
Let's get back to the game before I start thinking something weird.
If we had to strip off all our clothes manually before getting in the Sentinels, it'd be a whole lot more embarrassing.
That's that, then. Let's both try to do better in the future, ~name~.
It's just his ~clothing~, it's just his ~clothing~...
(Dammit, I can't think straight...)
Ugh, what am I thinking? Am I really getting turned on by this...?
Do you have a spare of your ~clothing~, ~name~? I could use some more clothes, if you don't mind.
Just be happy you still have clothes to spare, ~name~.
At this point, I'm not sure if you're good at this game or if I'm just terrible.
If you've got still got something like that to spare, I'd say you're in good shape.
Are you upset, ~name~-san? You wouldn't be here if you didn't want to take off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, right?
It's only something small... but I can avert my gaze if you'd like, ~name~-san.
If it makes you feel any better, ~name~-san, I'm already out of things like that.
It's not wrong to say I want you to take off more, right, ~name~-san? That's what this game is about, I think.
I don't care that you're taking off your ~clothing~, ~name~-san. Really. Not at all.
That's it? (Damn, I got excited...)
Keep it in your pants, Takatoshi... Wait...
If I have to do this, then you could at least... Sorry, you aren't obligated to do anything...
Don't mind me, ~name~-san. I'm already tuckered out.
(Shame I've already finished. Can't say that out loud, though.)
Think you can still win without your ~clothing~, ~name~-san? Only one way to find out.
Don't grow complacent yet, ~name~-san. I'm sure you want to win just as much as I do.
It's just your ~clothing~, right? Nothing worth crying over just yet.
We've both still got a lot to lose, ~name~-san. Let's try to keep it that way.
Would you have preferred it if I lost, ~name~-san?
Still beating me out, ~name~-san. I'm not sure if that says more about you or me.
See, ~name~-san? It's not so bad. Well, for now.
It's your prerogative, ~name~-san... But would you consider my situation too?
Back to the game, then. Maybe I'll get to see something nice next time.
If you thought that was awkward, ~name~-san... Imagine being in my shoes.
I suppose it doesn't really matter to me what you strip, but even still...
Honestly, I'm surprised the game's still going at this point.
You can sit down if you'd like, ~name~-san. It's surprisingly comfortable down here.
(I just have to ignore him. Who knows what'll fill up my head otherwise.)
Take off whatever you want, ~name~. I don't care. Not in the least bit.
Watching another guy shouldn't be making me feel like this...
It's not like I'm into men. You're just particularly alluring, ~name~, that's all.
If that's your only option, then maybe I still have a chance of walking away with my dignity...
(I can't deny that I'm getting turned on, but I can at least avoid saying it out loud.)
You're... awfully bold, ~name~...
Just tugging my dick while another guy takes off his ~clothing~... Times really have changed.
Did a game like this even exist in the forties? I certainly never heard of it.
I do still want to see you lose... J-Just because I'm mad that you beat me, nothing more!
You're not teasing me, right? No, nobody except him would do that.
Taking off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ just makes you look obscene, ~name~. You should put it back on before anybody has strange thoughts.
Okay, great. Now let's just get back to the game as quickly as possible.
(Is ~name~ getting excited about this? That would make it less strange for me to be excited too...)
I can't control how I'm feeling right now... and I can't exactly control my reaction, either...
It's... It's normal to feel like this. Every man has thoughts about other men... right?
I never felt like this about other men before I met Okino...
Ugh... I'm sorry, please carry on.
You should try to avoid losing any more, ~name~. I assume you don't want to join me.
(I'm not hard again, right? Okay, good.)
So after that... you don't have all that much left, huh?
So you might have to jack off after all, ~name~? I'm sure everybody except me is looking forward to it.
Because... It's the day I got to meet-- W-Wait! Chihiro-san!
I understand you have to take that off, ~name~-san, but do you really have to be so... lewd about it?
I wonder if Okino would look good in ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~...
I was taught not to look at women lecherously, but that's difficult in this setting.
I'm not ogling you, ~name~-san. Ah, not because you're not attractive, but, well...
I know it's getting tough, but if I've learned anything, it's that you shouldn't give up until the very end.
Making out your curves is getting easier, ~name~-san...
I appreciate the assistance, ~name~-san.
You really are stunning, ~name~-san...
It's getting down to the wire, but that doesn't mean you should give up.
You're not throwing for my sake, are you, ~name~-san? I'd appreciate the gesture, but...
(Getting to see ~name~-san without her ~clothing~ in the way... Must be good karma for my model behavior.)
Why did she run off...? And what's with that computer she left behind?
You know, ~name~-san, you... really are beautiful...
I'm sorry, I just need to, uh... adjust my pants.
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ just getting in the way anyway... of my chance at victory, I mean!
There's a reason why men in the army are kept away from women. Too easy to get distracted.
If I keep winning, then maybe... No, I can't lose focus now!
(Okino in ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~... Ugh, why am I thinking of that...?)
(Am I really... flirting? It's fine, right? Okino is the one who flirted with that rascal Ogata first...)
I'm not trying to be lecherous, really, but... This situation makes it difficult...
I still believe in you, ~name~-san, even if nobody else does.
(Is this... cheating? No, of course not! It's not like Okino and I are dating, anyway...)
I can't aid or harm you anymore, ~name~-san. All I can say is... good luck.
...All of it. Wait, all of it?!
It's... just your chest. Nothing to be excited about, really.
(Why is another guy's chest making me feel like this? Am I that pent up?)
I see naked chests all the time in the Sentinel... So it's not a big deal, right...?
If it's come down to this, ~name~, then your defeat may be imminent.
Alright... If ~name~ is taking off his ~clothing~, then maybe I still stand a chance...
~Name~'s chest... Nothing to get all heated about, right...?
It's just his chest... I'm not getting excited...
All it is is a man's chest... It's not worth breaking my concentration for...
Got a little careless, huh, ~name~?
It's not the worst thing you can take off. Trust me.
I used to see men take off their shirts all the time in the barracks. It's no big deal.
H-How?! I mean, I know how, but... why?! You've barely got anything left now!
Wow, you look pretty strong, ~name~! (What was I getting all worked up about?)
Not a lot of guys with muscles like yours in the 80s. Guess that happens in times of peace.
I used to have muscles like that. It's been too long since I've been able to work out seriously.
You look strong, ~name~, but there's always room for improvement.
Maybe we should work out together some time. Just a couple of guys getting sweaty... Wait...
Oh... You look pretty tough, ~name~. (See? Nothing to get excited about...)
Ah... You're surprisingly slim up there, ~name~...
(~Name~'s got no muscle up there... Just like him...)
Honestly, ~name~, you're kinda cute... Uh, for a guy, I mean.
...Okay, maybe a little...
...Maybe I shouldn't speak so soon...
...I'm not one to second-guess myself, but...
(I'm trying to act casual, but...)
Well... You are a little easy on the eyes, I'll give you that.
Are you popular with women, ~name~? ...Or maybe with men?
So we're really gonna get to see it, huh? Honestly, it's hard to believe...
You're really gonna show it off, ~name~? I respect your dedication, if nothing else...
Guess you were hoping you could avoid this. Other people might have been hoping the opposite.
(~Name~'s cock... Was I dreading this or looking forward to it...?)
I respect your conviction, but... I wouldn't blame you for a tactical retreat.
N-No, I'm not... Ugh, I can't even concentrate on denying it...
You're... You're really gonna show it off...?
Mmf... (Focus, Takatoshi... No, not on his dick...)
Well, you've already seen me jack off... (Wait, did that turn him on?)
I've cooled off a little... Or at least, I thought I did.
It's a good thing everybody is focusing on ~name~'s dick. Then they won't notice mine.
Oh, so yours is, uh... Huh...
Wow, it's... it's pretty small, huh...?
Am I really getting worked up over something that small...?
I... I wonder how it would feel...
I could engulf that with one hand... N-Not that I'd want to...
You're... You're not jealous, right...?
(Ah, hell... What has Okino done to me...?)
Well, it's, uh... cute. No, that isn't how you describe it...
I wonder if his is that small...
(Just think about something else. Like... yakisoba pan. Long, thick yakisoba pan...)
Well, uh, it could be worse. You could be... you know...
Huh... It's different compared to looking at your own, isn't it...
Well, that's, uh... Huh... (C'mon, don't get flustered now...)
That's, um... Well, it helps, I think...
Am I... seriously getting turned on right now...?
Well, that's... definitely a penis.
Are you already raring to go?
Am I... enjoying this? No, no, that can't be right...
Hah. With one that big, you'd be the talk of the barracks.
Well... If you have it, flaunt it, I suppose.
(Is he bigger than me...? Ugh, now I'm staring at it...)
Jeez... And I thought mine was big...
Must be hard to hide... when you get excited, I mean...
It's only natural for your eyes to get drawn to something that big, right...?
Not that I have a preference, but if I did... I guess that I prefer them a little smaller...
Big ones are overrated, anyway. Just makes it harder to hide it when you get too excited.
Gonna need two hands for that one. Your hands, not mine.
H-Huh?! Polly-san, you're passing on right in front of us?! Hold on, this is unfair! I only just got to meet you!
The Sentinel cockpit gives a pretty good view of everybody's chests. I try not to stare too hard.
(The thrill of this all is leaving me speechless...)
A girl's chest... Wish I could say I've seen plenty of those before, but...
So you're really going to show off your chest, ~name~-san? Should I look away, or...?
Boobs... Any guy would get excited because of that, right?
I've been waiting for this...
We're finally at the good part, huh...?
I'm allowed to be excited about this, right?
Sorry about this, ~name~-san... But you knew what you were getting into, right?
I'll admit, I have been a little curious...
This goes against everything I've been taught... But it is surprisingly fun.
Honestly, you did look a little flat...
Don't be upset, ~name~-san! I mean, some guys like them small!
Small ones are... surprisingly beautiful, aren't they?
(~Name~-san... She's pretty cute...)
Mmph...
Small ones are good too...
They're pretty... what would you say... perky?
You're cute, ~name~-san. Or, uh, would you prefer "adorable"?
If nothing else, I'm glad I got to see something nice to~background.time~.
O-Oh... So it was just a prank. On the one hand, I'm glad... On the other, now I feel stupid for caring.
They're nice and... shapely. Wait, no, that's not it...
Hmm... ~Name~-san, is it true that they bounce?
Not too large, but not too small... Just right.
(This... This is what made humanity worth defending.)
At least... I have something to look at.
I know you must be unhappy, ~name~-san. (But I feel much the opposite.)
I appreciate the view... What? That's what the game is about, right?
It might be too late to fully appreciate it, but I do like what I'm seeing.
Well... Better than having to show it while I was doing that, right?
Whoa... Just like that school nurse, Morimura...
You could tell they were big, but... not that big.
(Heh... I think I owe you one now, Okino.)
You know, the view from down here is surprisingly nice.
Maybe this place isn't so bad after all.
The only bad thing about this is that I've already finished...
Now, this... this is nice...
Can't complain about this...
You... don't mind if I look, right? It's hard not to.
Hmm? You have something to say? You can tell me anything, Chihiro-san. I swear on that much.
I've never seen a girl like this before...
Of course I know what girls look like down there, but... Well, this is my first time seeing it in person...
(Don't be a pervert, Takatoshi... But wait, isn't this game made for perverts...?)
This is... perverse! Obscene! (But tantalizing...)
Would it be better if you turned away, ~name~-san? I suppose everybody would get to see your butt.
Well... I'll admit, I have been anticipating this...
This almost feels voyeuristic...
Should I... stop? (Not like I could even if I wanted to...)
From this angle, this is all the more embarrassing.
So you're really going to bare all, ~name~-san...
Almost a shame that it's too early to go another round.
Ah, so you're a... W-Wait, a guy?! But... Huh?!
It's surprisingly... pink...
Ugh... This teasing is unbearable...
The things I want to do right now...
Huh... So that's what it looks like...
It's a little lower down than I expected.
No wonder so many guys devote so much time to chasing skirts.
You can look, but you can't touch... right?
I'm not a pervert, I swear! But you understand why it's difficult to look away.
Are you... already wet, ~name~-san?
(So if she just sat in my lap, then...)
The things I can see from this view...
Ah... I'm sorry, Chihiro-san. It had to happen at least once.
(Noodles stir-fried in sauce, enfolded in sweetened bread... I don't trust much in this post-war world...)
You are the pride of the Empire, ~name~~target.ifMale(|-san)~. Don't let yourself get embarrassed now.
Wait, you're Prince Shoutoku, Miko-san?! The one who brought Buddhism to our glorious nation?!
But... you shouldn't give up just yet! You're the Ultimate Programmer, so I know you're smart enough to win!
(But if there's one exception, it's my yakisoba pan.)
(~Name~~target.ifMale(|-san)~ has a weapon, doesn't ~target.ifMale(he|she)~? Maybe we should make one for No. 12...)
It's polite to take off your shoes indoors, anyway.
(Though... I'd be lying if I said I wasn't enjoying this a little bit.)
Delicious... Impossibly delicious!
Students in the 80s are so lackadaisical with their uniforms. Nothing like the proper ones that I remember.
Oh, about the "Sectors" I mentioned... They're different periods in times that we can travel between.
About what I said earlier... Okino is just my friend, alright? My friend who's also a boy.
Oh, about the Deimos... They're giant, mechanical monsters that destroy everything in their path. The Sentinels were made to fight them.
I think you should take off... Wait, you're out of clothes, aren't you?
You're out of clothes, right? So your only option is... wait...
So it's come to this, huh? I guess skill can't overcome luck sometimes.
I won't watch you do it, ~name~. I-It's not like I want to.
If you're out of clothes... then...
(~Name~... He's really going to...)
You don't have any other option, right?
I'm not sure what to say other than... Good luck?
I respect your guts, at least. Takes a lot not to just turn tail and flee.
(I'm really going to watch a man do this... Why do I feel excited...?)
I understand that this must be embarrassing. Just... try to get it over with quickly.
Well... I suppose company isn't entirely unwelcome.
(I'm getting turned on... but I don't need to say that out loud.)
Just close your eyes and think about something nice...
(Wait... So those weird noises Okino made when he thought I was sleeping... Don't tell me...)
Wow, you're... really going at it...
The way you're doing it... Is that how I look?
Have I been doing it wrong all this time?
You're being awfully fast, ~name~. Is it because you're excited?
Let's say, if I had to pick between watching a guy jack off, and fighting world-destroying machines... The former doesn't sound so bad anymore...
Are you getting close, or are you just getting started?
Don't let me distract you. Really.
(~Name~... Is he... looking at me?)
L-Let's just get this over with...
You're being awfully loud, ~name~...
Just ignore him... Before I start thinking weird things about him...
Whoa, that went everywhere...!
You must've been really pent up, huh?
Did... Did any of it get on me?
And I thought Deimos explosions were intense...
I-I'm... getting there myself...
Come on... I can do it too...
Eyes on the prize, Takatoshi... No, not that one...
Oh... I'm sorry, ~name~-san. It seems like you're out of items.
~Name~-san is out of clothing... So does that mean...?
We've already seen so much, but it seems like you're gonna have to do even more.
Was this outcome inevitable, or could you have avoided it...?
So it's come to this, then...
(~Name~-san masturbating... That sounds pretty nice...)
At least I'm not the only one who had to face defeat...
For your sake, I'll try not to watch.
Would you prefer it if I looked...? I know some people like that.
I'm sorry, ~name~-san. I hope my presence is, uh... helpful?
You can at least try to get it over with quickly, but I understand why that may be difficult.
Well... At least you're not alone, right?
I'm happy to have a partner. Especially one like you, ~name~-san.
Join me, ~name~-san. F-For my sake, if nothing else.
So that's what girls look like when they're doing it.
Is it better with two fingers, or three...?
Apparently they can watch things like this on the "internet" in the future.
You're going it at it quite vigorously, ~name~-san.
Do all girls do it like that, or just you?
This feels wrong, but I still want to watch...
It'd probably be better if I kept my mouth shut, wouldn't it?
Just a little further, ~name~-san! I believe in you!
~Name~-san... She's glistening...
I'm glad to have something to look at, at least...
A beautiful girl like ~name~-san... It's a blessing, really.
Mmph... This isn't so bad...
Wow... That really did go everywhere.
Is that what they call... "squirting"?
That seemed like a big one, ~name~-san. Er, was it?
Well, that was certainly an experience.
I'm... I'm getting there, myself...
A girl's orgasm... It really is incredible...
~Name~-san beat me to it... I have to redouble my efforts...
I... I really have to do that, don't I? And worst of all, I'm the first one...
Damn... I knew what I was signing up for, but I at least hoped I could avoid it.
Well, I'll... I'll give it my best effort, then! That's the least a true son of Japan can do! (Ugh...)
(Chihiro is a guy, I know that... So why can't I stop looking at him?)
Okay, if I get on my knees... That should make it a little easier...
Nngh, this is humiliating... but I can't stop...
I hardly have time for this nowadays... Explains why I'm so pent up...
Oki... no, I mean... Kiriko-san...

I'm... I'm acting like a...

Ugh... (Is... Is it coming out already...?)
I am the pride of the Empire... I can't quit now...
I shouldn't be this erect right now...
Don't look at me, alright? This is hard enough as it is...
So what if I want to do things to him? That's doesn't mean I'm... (Okay, maybe it does a little...)
(His hands are so small... So I wonder how they would feel...)
(Gotta be careful. Wouldn't wanna accidentally transmit Sentinel No. 12.)
Doing this in front of ~player~ is... oddly exciting...
(~Player~... wanted to see a guy do this, didn't he...?)
Do you... like men, ~player~? (Maybe it isn't so odd...)
Are you looking at me, ~player~? I mean, I wouldn't mind if you did...
You wanted to see me do this, right, ~player~? Am I just really popular with men...?
(That's right... I still like girls... Like ~player~-san...)
You're... very beautiful, ~player~-san... Did I forget to say that before now?
This is incredibly obscene, but... I don't mind it as much when you're here, ~player~-san...
Nngh...
That's it... Come on...
Almost... isn't good enough...
Life really does come at you fast...
He knows he gets to me... That's why he does it...
I just want to shut him up...
Would he... Would he like it if I...?
Ahh... Okino...!
Ugh... Damn it... Is that what he wanted when he sent me here?
Keitaro is probably at his home with Natsuno-san right now. I'm glad things are going well for him.
...Wasn't I here to loosen up? Guess I kinda forgot about it along the way.
Okino once said that I'm reliable. What do you think, ~player~~player.ifMale(|-san)~?
How much longer is this going to go on for...?
I'm allowed to put my clothes back on after this, right?
I'll admit, this was... strangely fun. I might not be opposed to another round so long as you're here, ~player~~player.ifMale(|-san)~.
If Okino were here, I wonder what order he would have taken off his clothes in.
Street vendor yakisoba pan, school cafeteria yakisoba pan, convenience store yakisoba pan... The differences are subtle, but you have to be aware of them.
Back in my day, television was hardly considered practical. Now everybody has one in their home. Times really have changed.
Sometimes, I miss the 40s. Even still, I'm glad that the world has found some semblance of peace now.
...Hold on, what just happened?
Phew. Glad I didn't have to go any further than that.
It was a well-fought battle, ~player~~player.ifMale(|-san)~. I'm honored to have gotten to compete against somebody like you.
It was a well-played game... even if I still feel like I never really understood what was happening.
Here, some yakisoba pan. Because you're epic.
